projects.title: Use of AI for cyber attack prevention
projects.description: Developed an intrusion detection system that uses machine learning algorithms to detect and prevent Phishing attacks and SQL injection on a server.

projects.title: Emotion Recognition via Speech
projects.description: Web app that detects emotions from a user's speech. The ML model in the backend Flask server detects the user's gender and emotional state. The model can recognize 7 emotions including sadness, happiness, neutrality, anger, fear, excitement, etc.

projects.title: Hotel Website hosting using AWS
projects.note: Note: I have closed the instance thus the website is no longer active
projects.description: Hosted a website on AWS using free instances like :AWS S3, AWS DynamoDB, AWS API Gateway, AWS Lambda
